description:
Join author Barton Poulson as he introduces the R statistical processing
language, including how to install R on your computer, read data from SPSS and
spreadsheets, and use packages for advanced R functions.  
  
The course continues with examples on how to create charts and plots, check
statistical assumptions and the reliability of your data, look for data
outliers, and use other data analysis tools. Finally, learn how to get charts
and tables out of R and share your results with presentations and web pages.
title: Up and Running with R
